DOC.HEADLINE: EARNINGS : ARCO REPORTS 40 % DECLINE IN PROFIT FOR FIRST_QUARTER
DOC.TEXT: Citing low crude_oil prices at the start of the year , Atlantic Richfield Co . on Monday reported a sharply lower first-quarter profit . Los Angeles-based Arco said its first-quarter profit fell more_than 40 % to $ 149 million , or 92 cents a share , from $ 260 million , or $ 1.60 a share , a year ago . Revenue fell to $ 3.93 billion from $ 4.67 billion . Arco said earnings in its worldwide oil and gas exploration and production operations fell 54 % to $ 82 million , while refining and marketing earnings rose about 2 % to $ 95 million .
